body_html: I just want to use the fix. So I should just use tensorflow 1.6? It demands cuda-9.0 but the server I'm using has cuda-8.0 and most probably unlikely to change. Just to make sure, we're on the same page about this issue right?
body_text: I just want to use the fix. So I should just use tensorflow 1.6? It demands cuda-9.0 but the server I'm using has cuda-8.0 and most probably unlikely to change. Just to make sure, we're on the same page about this issue right?
body: I just want to use the fix. So I should just use tensorflow 1.6? It demands cuda-9.0 but the server I'm using has cuda-8.0 and most probably unlikely to change. Just to make sure, we're on the same page about [this issue](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17009#issuecomment-367940419) right?
